title: 92/391/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 July 1992 altering the adjustment aid to the Portuguese refining industry for raw sugar imported from third countries at a reduced levy for the 1992/93 marketing year into Portugal
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 July 1992  altering the adjustment aid to the Portuguese refining industry for raw sugar imported from third countries at a reduced levy for the 1992/93 marketing year into Portugal  (92/391/EEC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The adjustment aid provided for in the second subparagraph of Article 9 (4) (c) of Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81 shall be fixed et ECU 1,58 per 100 kilograms of sugar expressed as white sugar for the 1992/93 marketing year.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 July 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 177, 1. 7. 1981, p. 4. (2) OJ No L 6, 11. 1. 1992, p. 19. (3) OJ No L 182, 2. 7. 1992, p. 80.
